languages.text: {n}Когда вы подходите ближе, блюстители расступаются в почтительном поклоне, открывая вам путь к семейству Версериан. Усталая и слегка взъерошенная Клеменциа первой учтиво склоняет голову перед вами. Несколько мужчин и женщин за ее спиной повторяют за ней.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Когда вы подходите ближе, стражники расступаются в почтительном поклоне, открывая вам путь к семейству Версериан. Усталая и слегка взъерошенная Клеменциа первой учтиво склоняет голову перед вами. Несколько мужчин и женщин за ее спиной повторяют за ней.{/n}

languages.text: {n}As you draw closer, the wardens step aside, bowing respectfully, allowing you to approach the Werserian family. Clementia, tired and slightly dishevelled, is the first to bow her head to you in deference. Several men and women behind her follow suit.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Когда вы подходите ближе, блюстители расступаются в почтительном поклоне, открывая вам путь к семейству Версериан. Усталая и слегка взъерошенная Клеменциа первой учтиво склоняет голову перед вами. Несколько мужчин и женщин за ее спиной повторяют за ней.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}When you come closer, the wardens step aside, bowing respectfully, allowing you to approach the Werserian family. Clementia, tired and slightly dishevelled, is the first to bow her head to you in reverence. Several men and women behind her follow suit.{/n}

{n}When you come closer, the wardens step aside, bowing respectfully, allowing you to approach the Werserian family. Clementia, tired and slightly dishevelled, is the first to bow her head to you in reverence. Several men and women behind her follow suit.{/n}

{n}As you come closer, the wardens step aside, bowing respectfully, allowing you to approach the Werserian family. Clementia, tired and slightly dishevelled, is the first to bow her head to you in reverence. Several men and women behind her follow suit.{/n}

{n}As you come closer, the wardens step aside, bowing respectfully, allowing you to approach the Werserian family. Clementia, tired and slightly dishevelled, is the first to bow her head to you in reverence. Several men and women behind her follow suit.{/n}

{n}As you draw closer, the wardens step aside, bowing respectfully, allowing you to approach the Werserian family. Clementia, tired and slightly dishevelled, is the first to bow her head to you in deference. Several men and women behind her follow suit.{/n}

{n}As you draw closer, the wardens step aside, bowing respectfully, allowing you to approach the Werserian family. Clementia, tired and slightly dishevelled, is the first to bow her head to you in deference. Several men and women behind her follow suit.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたが近づくとワーデンはウェルザリアン一族のそばに寄れるよう道をあけ、うやうやしく頭を下げる。クレメンティアはやや無造作な、疲れた姿を見せてはいるものの、あなたに敬意を表していち早く頭を下げる。数人の男女がクレメンティアの後に続いて礼をする。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As you draw closer, the wardens step aside, bowing respectfully, allowing you to approach the Werserian family. Clementia, tired and slightly dishevelled, is the first to bow her head to you in deference. Several men and women behind her follow suit.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたが近づくとワーデンはウェルザリアン一族のそばに寄れるよう道をあけ、うやうやしく頭を下げる。クレメンティアはやや無造作な、疲れた姿を見せてはいるものの、あなたに敬意を表していち早く頭を下げる。数人の男女がクレメンティアの後に続いて礼をする。{/n}

languages.text: {n}当你靠近之后，守卫让开了路，向你恭敬地鞠了一躬。你走到韦尔森家族的面前。身心俱疲、仪容不整的克莱门缇雅率先向你郑重鞠躬，随后其他几名贵族男女也向你躬身行礼。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As you draw closer, the wardens step aside, bowing respectfully, allowing you to approach the Werserian family. Clementia, tired and slightly dishevelled, is the first to bow her head to you in deference. Several men and women behind her follow suit.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}当你走近之后，守卫让开了路，向你恭敬地鞠了一躬。你走到韦尔森家族的面前。身心俱疲、仪容不整的克莱门缇雅率先鞠了一躬，随后其他几名贵族男女也向你躬身行礼。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les gardiens s'écartent sur votre passage pour vous permettre d'approcher les Werserian. Clémentia, l'air épuisé, est la première à s'incliner, bientôt suivie par le reste des siens.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As you draw closer, the wardens step aside, bowing respectfully, allowing you to approach the Werserian family. Clementia, tired and slightly dishevelled, is the first to bow her head to you in deference. Several men and women behind her follow suit.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les gardiens s'écartent sur votre passage pour vous permettre d'approcher les Werserian. Clémentia, l'air épuisé, est la première à s'incliner, bientôt suivie par le reste de sa famille.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Al acercarte, los guardias se apartan, inclinándose ante ti en señal de respeto, permitiéndote acercarte a la familia Werserian. Clementia, cansada y algo desaliñada, es la primera en inclinar la cabeza como muestra de respeto. Detrás de ella, varios hombres y mujeres hacen lo mismo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As you draw closer, the wardens step aside, bowing respectfully, allowing you to approach the Werserian family. Clementia, tired and slightly dishevelled, is the first to bow her head to you in deference. Several men and women behind her follow suit.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Al acercarte, los guardias se apartan, inclinándose ante ti en señal de respeto, permitiéndote acercarte a la familia Werserian. Clementia, cansada y algo desaliñada, es la primera en inclinar la cabeza haciéndote una reverencia. Detrás de ella, varios hombres y mujeres hacen lo mismo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Als du näherkommst, treten die Wachen beiseite, verneigen sich respektvoll und lassen dich zu den Werserians durch. Clementia, müde und etwas derangiert, verneigt sich als Erste ehrfürchtig vor dir. Mehrere Männer und Frauen hinter ihr tun es dir gleich.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As you draw closer, the wardens step aside, bowing respectfully, allowing you to approach the Werserian family. Clementia, tired and slightly dishevelled, is the first to bow her head to you in deference. Several men and women behind her follow suit.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Als du näherkommst, treten die Wachen beiseite, verneigen sich respektvoll und lassen dich zu den Werserians durch. Clementia, müde und etwas derangiert, verneigt sich als Erste ehrfürchtig vor dir. Mehrere Männer und Frauen hinter ihr tun es dir gleich.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sen Werserian Hanesi'ne yaklaşırken dizdarlar, yana çekilip saygıyla eğiliyor. Yorgun ve bir nebze dağınık görünen Celementia, başını hürmetle eğen ilk kişi oluyor. Arkasındakiler de onu takip ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As you draw closer, the wardens step aside, bowing respectfully, allowing you to approach the Werserian family. Clementia, tired and slightly dishevelled, is the first to bow her head to you in deference. Several men and women behind her follow suit.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sen Werserian Hanesi'ne yaklaşırken muhafızlar yana çekilip saygıyla eğiliyor. Yorgun ve bir nebze dağınık görünen Celementia, başını hürmetle eğen ilk kişi oluyor. Arkasındakiler de onu takip ediyor.{/n}
